title: Can I ignore demotion warning in Gold 5?
body: I was one game away from Gold 4 then I lost 5 games in row and there's a demotion warning above my rank. Can I ignore the warning and not play ranked until the end of the season and remain in Gold 5?

replies.body: Yes..... Yellow shield means you are close to drop... Red means u will drop in next one or 2 games... but yes you dont decay in gold. Only Plat+
What is this shield you're talking about?
The demotion warning??? It come in the form of a shied
